S04n432:1: māraśca bhikṣavaḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho'bhūt avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī |
S04n432:11: jīvato jīvitaṃ śreyo jīvan dharmaṃ cariṣyasi |
S04n432:12: jīvaṃ hi tāni kurute yāni kṛtvā na śocati ||4 ||
S04n432:13: kṛśo vivarṇo dīnastvaṃ antike maraṇaṃ tava |
S04n432:15: dadataḥ satataṃ dānaṃ agnihotraṃ ca juhvataḥ |
S04n432:21: aṇumātraṃ hi me puṇyairartho māra na vidyate |
S04n432:22: artho yeṣāṃ tu puṇyena tānevaṃ vaktumarhasi ||9 ||
S04n432:23: naivāhaṃ maraṇaṃ manye maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam |
S04n432:27: śoṇite tu viśuṣke vai tato māṃsaṃ viśuṣyati |
S04n432:31: cittaṃ nāvekṣate kāyaṃ paśya sattvasya śuddhatām ||13 ||
S04n432:32: asti chandaṃ tathā vīryaṃ prajñāpi mama vidyate |
S04n432:33: taṃ na paśyāmyahaṃ loke vīryādyo māṃ vicālayet ||14 ||
S04n432:36: nāśūro jayate senāṃ jitvā caināṃ na manyate |
S04n432:37: śūrastu jayate senāṃ laghu māra jayāmi te ||16 ||
S04n432:39: tṛtīyā kṣutpipāsā te tṛṣṇā senā caturthikā ||17 ||
S04n432:40: pañcamī styānamiddhaṃ te bhayaṃ ṣaṣṭī nirucyate |
S04n432:42: lobhaślokau ca saṃskārau mithyālabdhaṃ ca yadyaśaḥ |
S04n432:44: eṣā hi namuceḥ senā kṛṣṇabandhoḥ pratāpinaḥ |
S04n432:46: yā te senā dharṣayati lokamenaṃ sadevakam |
S04n432:48: smṛtiṃ sūpasthitāṃ kṛtvā prajñāṃ caiva subhāvitām |
S04n432:50: evamukte māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhī durmanā anāttamanā vipratisārī tatraivāntaradhāt ||
S04n432:51: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt-ye kecicchramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasvātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti etāvatparamaṃ te duḥkhamanubhavanti ||
S04n432:52: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-anayāpi khalu mayā caryayā anayāpi pratipadā na kaściduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ |
S04n432:56: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhavat-yadahaṃ piturudyāne jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣaṇṇo viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣam,
S04n432:60: tasya mamaitadabhūt-nāsau mārgaḥ śakyaḥ evaṃ daurbalyaprāptenābhisaṃboddhum |
S04n432:62: na me paścimā janatā anukampitā syāt |
S04n432:65: tatra bhikṣavo ye te lūhādhimuktā devaputrāste mama cetasaścetasaiva parivitarkamājñāya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya māmevamāhuḥ-mā sma tvaṃ satpuruṣa audārikamāhāramāhareḥ |
S04n432:67: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-ahaṃ khalvanaśana ityātmānaṃ pratijāne,
S04n432:68: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma yathānaśanaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ |
S04n432:69: itīva me khalu lūhādhimuktā devaputrā romakūpairojaḥ prakṣipanti |
S04n432:71: tato bodhisattvo mṛṣāvādaparihārārthaṃ tān devaputrān pratikṣipyaudārikamāhāramāhartu cittaṃ nāmayati sma ||
S04n432:72: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavratatapaḥsamuttīrṇo bodhisattvo'smādāsanādutthāyaudārikamāhāramāhariṣyāmīti vācaṃ niścārayati sma |
S04n432:74: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ pañcānāṃ bhadravargīyānāmetadabhūt-tayāpi tāvaccaryayā tayāpi tāvatpratipadā śramaṇena gautamena na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum,
S04n432:77: te vārāṇasīṃ gatvā ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve vyāhārṣuḥ ||
S04n432:78: tatra bodhisattvamādita eva duṣkaracaryāṃ carantaṃ daśa grāmikaduhitaraḥ kumārya upagacchan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca |
S04n432:81: balā ca nāma dārikā balaguptā ca supriyā ca vijayasenā ca atimuktakamalā ca sundarī ca kumbhakārī ca uluvillikā ca jaṭilikā ca sujātā ca nāma grāmikaduhitāḥ |
S04n432:82: ābhiḥ kumārikābhirbodhisattvāya sarvāstā yūṣavidhāḥ kṛtvopanāmitā abhūvan |
S04n432:83: tāścābhyavahṛtya bodhisattvaḥ krameṇa gocaragrāme piṇḍāya caran varṇarūpabalavānabhūt |
S04n432:84: tadagreṇa bodhisattvaḥ sundaraḥ śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa ityācakṣate ||
S04n432:85: tatra ca bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā bodhisattvasya duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ ādita eva bodhisattvasya vratatapaḥsamuttāraṇārthaṃ śarīrasyāpyāyanahetośca pratidivasamaṣṭaśataṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ bhojayati sma |
S04n432:86: evaṃ ca praṇidadhāti sma-mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeteti ||
S04n432:87: tasya me bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavyativṛttasya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi parijīrṇānyabhūvan |
S04n432:88: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-sacedahaṃ kaupīnapracchādanaṃ labheyam,
S04n432:90: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturdāsī rādhā nāma kālagatābhūt |
S04n432:93: tato'haṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ vāmena pādenākramya dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ prasāryāvanato'bhūttadrahītum |
S04n432:94: atha bhaumā devā antarīkṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma-āścaryaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidaṃ mārṣāḥ |
S04n432:95: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti |
S04n432:96: antarīkṣā devā bhaumānāṃ devānāṃ śabdaṃ śratvā cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma |
S04n432:103: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhuvanādekaghoṣa ekasaṃnirnādo'bhyudgato'bhūt āścaryamidaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidam |
S04n432:104: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti ||
S04n432:108: tatastatraiva devatā pāṇinā mahīṃ parāhanti sma |
S04n432:117: atha śakro devarājo bodhisattvamevamāha-dadasvedaṃ satpuruṣa mahyam |
S04n432:119: tato bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃkāritāṃ pravrajyāyāḥ saṃdarśayituṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ śakrasyādatvā svayameva prakṣālayati sma |
S04n432:121: māreṇa ca pāpīyasā īrṣyādharmaparītena puṣkariṇyā atyucchritāni taṭāni nirmitānyabhūvan |
S04n432:123: tatra devatāṃ bodhisattvo lokānuvṛttyā devatānugrahārthaṃ cābravīt-āhara devate vṛkṣaśākhāmiti |
S04n432:126: uttīrya ca tasya kakubhapādapasyādhastāttatpāṃśukūlaṃ saṃghāṭīkṛtya āsīvyati sma |
S04n432:127: adyāpi tat pāṃśukūlaṃ sīvanamityevaṃ saṃjñāyate sma ||
S04n432:129: sa divyāni cīvarāṇi kāṣāyaraṅgaraktāni kalpikāni śramaṇasārūpyāṇi bodhisattvāyopanāmayati sma |
S04n432:130: bodhisattvaśca tāni gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇe nivāsya saṃghāṭīprāvṛtya gocaragrāmābhimukho'bhut ||
S04n432:131: tatra devatābhirurubilvāsenāpatigrāmake nandikagrāmikaduhituḥ sujātāyā ārocitamabhūdardharātrasamaye-yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yajase tasmādvratāduttīrṇaḥ saḥ |
S04n432:133: tvayā ca pūrve praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam-mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta iti |
S04n432:135: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā nandikagrāmaduhitā teṣāṃ devatānāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śīghraṃ gosahasrasya kṣīrātsaptakṛtsāroddhṛtādagryamojomaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīte sma |
S04n432:137: bhinavaistaṇḍulairabhinavāyāṃ sthālyāmabhinavāṃ cullīmupalipya tadbhojanaṃ sādhayati sma |
S04n432:138: tasmiṃśca sādhyamāne imāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante sma-tasmin khalvapi kṣīre śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartapadmavardhamānādīni maṅgalyāni saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n432:140: niḥsaṃśayamidaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpsyati |
S04n432:143: tataḥ sujātā taṃ pāyasaṃ pakvaṃ sthaṇḍilamupalipya puṣpairavakīrya gandhodakenābhyukṣya āsanaṃ prajñāpya satkṛtyottarāṃ nāma ceṭīmāmantrayate sma-gacchottare brāhmaṇamānaya |
S04n432:145: sādhvārya iti pratiśrutya uttarā pūrvāṃ diśamagamat |
S04n432:151: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputraiḥ sarve'nyatīrthikā nigṛhītā abhūvan |
S04n432:153: tataḥ sā āgatvā svāminīmevamāha-na khalvārye anyaḥ kaścid dṛśyate śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā,
S04n432:160: sādhvārye ityuttarā gatvā bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya sujātāyā nāmnopanimantrayate sma |
S04n432:161: tato bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturniveśanaṃ gatvā prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat |
S04n432:162: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā suvarṇamayīṃ pātrīṃ madhupāyasapūrṇāṃ bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma ||
S04n432:165: atha bodhisattvastadbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya sujātāṃ grāmikaduhitarametadavocat-iyaṃ bhagini suvarṇapātrī |
S04n432:171: atha bodhisattvastaṃ piṇḍapātramādāyorubilvāyā niṣkramya nāganadīṃ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nadīṃ nairañjanāmupasaṃkramya taṃ piṇḍapātraṃ cīvarāṇi caikānte nikṣipya nadīṃ nairañjanāmavatarati sma gātrāṇi śītalīkartum ||
S04n432:172: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ snāyato'nekāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi divyāgurucandanacūrṇavilepanairnadīmāloḍayanti sma |
S04n432:173: divyāni ca nānāvarṇāni kusumāni jale kṣipanti sma yaduta bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe ||
S04n432:174: tena khalu punaḥ samayena nairañjanā nadī divyairgandhaiḥ puṣpaiśca samākulā vahati sma |
S04n432:176: taṃ devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhyutkṣipya svakasvakāni bhavanāni nayanti sma caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca ||
S04n432:178: tāni sarvāṇi sujātā grāmikaduhitā maṅgalyānīti kṛtvā caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca parigṛhṇīte sma ||
S04n432:179: nadyuttīrṇaśca bodhisattvaḥ pulinaṃ nirīkṣate sma upaveṣṭukāmaḥ |
S04n432:180: atha yā nairañjanāyāṃ nadyāṃ nāgakanyā sā dharaṇitalādabhyudgabhya maṇimayaṃ (manoramaṃ)
S04n432:182: tatra bodhisattvo niṣadya yāvadarthaṃ taṃ madhupāyasaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sujātāyā grāmikaduhituranukampāmupādāya |
S04n432:183: paribhujya ca tāṃ suvarṇapātrīmanapekṣo vāriṇi prākṣipati sma |
S04n432:184: kṣiptamātrāṃ ca tāṃ sāgaro nāgarājaścittikārabahumānajāto gṛhītvā svabhavanābhimukhaḥ prasthito'bhut pūjārheti kṛtvā |
S04n432:185: atha daśaśatanayanaḥ puraṃdaro garuḍarūpamabhinirmāya vajratuṇḍo bhūtvā sāgarasya nāgarājasyāntikāttāṃ suvarṇapātrīṃ hartumārabdhaḥ |
S04n432:187: tadā svarūpeṇādareṇa yācitvā trāyatriṃśadbhavanaṃ nītavān pūjārthaṃ caityārthaṃ ca |
S04n432:189: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratisaṃvatsaraṃ pātrīmaho vartate |
S04n432:190: tacca bhadrāsanaṃ tayaiva nāgakanyayā parigṛhītaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca ||
S04n432:192: atha tatkṣaṇameva bodhisattvasya puṇyabalena prajñābalena pūrvikā kāye śubhavarṇapuṣkaratā prādurabhūt |
S04n432:195: ṣaḍvarṣa vrata uttaritva bhagavān evaṃ matiṃ cintayan
S04n432:198: no me syādanukampitā hi janatā evaṃ bhavet paścimā ||23 ||
S04n432:199: yattvaudārika bhuktva bhojanavaraṃ kāye balaṃ kṛtvanā
S04n432:202: no śaktā siya budhyanāya amṛtaṃ kāyena te durbalāḥ ||24 ||
S04n432:203: sā ca grāmikadhīta pūrvacaritā nāmnā sujātā iti
S04n432:204: yajñā nityu yajāti evamanasā siddhe vrataṃ nāyake |
S04n432:205: sā devāna niśāmya codana tadā gṛhyā madhūpāyasaṃ
S04n432:209: tīrṇastāraku pārasattva matimāṃ snāne matiṃ cintayan
S04n432:210: oruhyā nadi snāpi śuddhavimalo lokānukampī muniḥ ||26 ||
S04n432:211: devā koṭisahasra hṛṣṭamanasā gandhāmbu cūrṇāni ca
S04n432:212: oruhyā nadi loḍayanti salilaṃ snānārtha sattvottame |
S04n432:213: snānā snātvana bodhisattva vimalastīre sthitaḥ sūrataḥ
S04n432:215: kāṣāyāni ca vastra nirmala śubhā tā devaputro dade
S04n432:216: kalpīyāni ca saṃnivāsya bhagavāṃstīre hi nadyāḥ sthitaḥ |
S04n432:217: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasā bhadrāsanaṃ sā nyaṣīt
S04n432:219: dattvā bhojanu sā sujāta matimāṃ svarṇāmaye bhājane
S04n432:220: vanditvā caraṇāni sā pramuditā paribhuṅkṣva me sārathe |
S04n432:221: bhuktvā bhojanu yāvadartha matimān pātrīṃ jale prākṣipat
S04n432:222: tāṃ jagrāha puraṃdaraḥ suraguruḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmyaham ||29 ||
S04n432:223: yada bhuktaṃ ca jinena bhojanavaraṃ odārikaṃ tatkṣaṇe
S04n432:224: tasyā kāyabalaṃ ca tejaśiriyā pūrvaṃ yathā saṃsthitam |
S04n432:225: dharmā kṛtva kathā sujāta maruṇāṃ kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuṃ
